name: Darwin
description:
Note: This game is still in very early development and may cause lag, bugs, or glitches to occur. Not every feature has been added/finished so some things may not work as they will in the first full version.

Darwin has locked you up. Now it's up to you to escape. But it isn't as easy as it sounds. You must constantly run from the officer before he catches you and locks you back up. While you're running, you must find objects to escape prison.

Good luck.

ASDW/Arrows to move , E to pick things up , Q to drop things , tab to zoom view

Version 0.4.1

*Fixed a few bugs.

*Darwin moves a bit slower.
